title: New Client Errors

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some serious network issues staying in-game, and packet loss that can cause input delays or unresponsiveness.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of the situation, and let me know what you find.  We'll go from there!

> [{quoted}](name=Surgesf4,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=doFo2aa0,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-25T21:46:38.194+0000)
>
> Is anyone else having a problem connecting to a game/ loading is taking forever or mouse disabling at random? I have all three and it is very annoying! Everything worked fine on old client and I have been playing since season 1;  often at 30 frames per second at best. Please let me know if this is a common problem or will be fixed since if I recall correctly the game was designed for crappy computer owners to have fun with the game as well.
> Thank you and best regards,
> -Surge{{champion:103}}

Hello!

You may want to give the new Low Spec Mode a try in order to get the performance you are used to. In the client, out of game, click the Cog Wheel in the upper Right corner. In that menu under the Client > General tab (default tab) you should see 'Enabled Low Spec Mode' at the top, apply it and see how it goes.
